definition: generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The flaxseed study was aimed at fighting prostate cancer, not treating a side effect.
sentences.chinese: 亚麻子研究的目的抗前列腺癌，并非治疗其副作用。

sentences.english: You'll also find these benefits in flaxseed oil and walnuts.
sentences.chinese: 亚麻子油和核桃也有这些功效。

sentences.english: Other cholesterol-lowering options include flaxseed and garlic.
sentences.chinese: 其他如亚麻子和大蒜也可降低胆固醇。

sentences.english: A cooked mix of wood oil and mod. colophony, linseed oil.
sentences.chinese: 木质油，适量松香，亚麻子油煮成的混合物。

sentences.english: Jones said that Graham told her it was flaxseed oil.
sentences.chinese: 琼斯称当时格雷厄姆告诉她服用的是亚麻子油。

definition: saw palmetto (Serenoa repens, a small palm, an extract of whose fruit is used medicinally)
